front.title: Virtual Machine Mobility Protocol for Overlay Networks

abstract.t: This document specifies a virtual machine mobility protocol in data centers built with overlay-based network virtualization approach. The protocol is based on using NVA-NVE protocol to update ARP table or neighbor cache entries at the NVA and the source NVEs tunneling in-flight packets to the destination NVE after the virtual machine moves from source NVE to the destination NVE.
